amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to reduce funding for the Southeast Crescent Regional Commission to FY19 levels and transfer the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Southeast Crescent Regional Commission by $19,750,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 291 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 291 (Roll no. 370).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
